title: Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc
summary: Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc[lower-alpha 3] is a visual novel adventure game developed and published by Spike as the first game in the Danganronpa series. The game was originally released in Japan for the PlayStation Portable in November 2010 and was later ported to Android and iOS in August 2012. Danganronpa was localized and published in English regions by NIS America for multiple consoles including the PC, Mac, Linux among others.
